website_summaries.verdict: There is no question that the best Alienware has to offer would be an unrivaled gaming laptop, but a PC this advanced comes with a hefty price tag.

customer_reviews.title: Would not regret!
customer_reviews.text: Realy good looking powerful machine! -Screen is awesome -Sound is not bad, little bit flat, need more bass! -Battery sucks! -I have expext more from the video. -Processor fantastic -Tobi eye tracking is usefull for this laptop, because you gonna need to do the best, to save some power if it is not plugged in. -Alienware still got to work on cooling! I think you guys have to start using nitrogen!
customer_reviews.author: Grigor

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop for gaming, no problems! Loves to heat up!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, heats a lot of course and not much to do about it but for gaming it can compete with any gaming laptop. Haven’t experienced any problems yet so I’m glad. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Alienware Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Really excellent laptop, with all of the best modern tech. Very light and thin. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: william deitrick

customer_reviews.title: Good machine for machine learning
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and compact enough to put in backpack. I use the laptop to run machine learning models mainly. It does a perfect job! For people who would have some complaints about thermal and soldered RAM, this is a trade off for lighter laptop. I’m satisfied about this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came with broken graphics card
customer_reviews.text: Got this new in December and right away the Nvidia graphics card was shot and blue screening the computer every 60 seconds. Which, upon doing some more in depth reading about the issue, is pretty common for this particular laptop. The rest of the computer works great; it's very fast and sleek and has decent memory. Just wished that it didn't come broken so we didn't have to jump through hoops and phonecalls to get it fixed. Super annoying working with the customer service reps. Impossible to reach through email, the only option is via phone.
customer_reviews.author: Nova

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for the last couple of months and I'm absolulty inlove. It's fast, powerful, and easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy and no type c charging
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy, no type c charging and charging adapter weighs just as much as the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: On time and as advertised! Great product, seller is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic laptop. Sent on time. The seller deserves 10 stars! They were nice enough to give me an upgrade at no extra cost. They treat their customers right. I'm coming to them when it's time to get a family laptop next year.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Grove

customer_reviews.title: Short battery life but awesome laptop
customer_reviews.text: Battery life sucks, but overall awesome gaming laptop! I’m enjoying lots of games. I just keep it plugged in since it dies under 2hrs on battery.
customer_reviews.author: Catlheesi

customer_reviews.title: Very cool laptop but it is loud
customer_reviews.text: A very high quality laptop for gaming but it is very loud because of how thin it is.
customer_reviews.author: Salvador

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I just received it today and I’m in love it’s such high quality and very good in general I would recommend 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY, it will be dead in a few months
customer_reviews.text: Have the lunar white, 2070, 240hz display: First the heating left visible browning on the surface of the laptop; they came out and installed new panels. A week later. The laptop would be plugged in and laptop won’t charge. Now completely dead. $2500 for a brick. They refuse to replace the unit while it’s under warranty!? After jumping through hoops, they finally scheduled repairs. On day of repair they called to cancel?? It's been a month now that I have had a dead product...this after only 5 months! Stay away.. buy a Razer.
customer_reviews.author: Moe Nawabi

customer_reviews.title: Soldered Ram? Returned it.  My fault (didn't read about it)  but soldered ram is a no-no.
customer_reviews.text: Soldered Ram is a problem waiting to happen if you can't grab a new sodimm. Soldered wireless is meh, but Ram?
customer_reviews.author: N. G. Varras

product_meta.title: Alienware New M15 Gaming Laptop, 15.6" 144hz FHD Display, Intel Core i7-9750H, NVIDIA RTX 2060 6GB, 512GB SSD, 16GB RAM, AWYA15-7947BLK-PUS
product_meta.description: Capacity:NVIDIA RTX 2060 6GB| Style:NVIDIA RTX 2060 6GBThe M15 is as impressive on the inside as it is iconic with its exclusive design on the outside Upon placing your hands on the newly engineered keyboard and touchpad you can feel the difference with newly shaped keys their 1 7mm travel (up from 1 4mm) in the previous M15 and the new precision-point glass touchpad The quality and performance is communicated by the lightness and structural rigidity of the magnesium alloy chassis Alienware’s advanced cryo-tech 3 0 technology platform on the Alienware M15 brings a 10% CPU fan diameter increase 20% GPU fan diameter increase 10% airflow increase 20% less airflow impedance and even 10 more total fan blades over the predecessor.
feature_bullets: Alienware thinnest notebook ever for gamers looking for a thin gaming notebook that does not sacrifice performance or design
Premium build high-end materials like magnesium alloy copper and steel provide a premium lightweight and performance-driven gaming experience
Advanced thermal technology Alienware cryo-tech V3 0 optimizes component cooling which maximizes overall performance and keeps your laptop cool to the touch
Game longer than ever a lithium Ion 76Whr battery delivers longer uninterrupted game play without a charge thanks to an exceptional life span
Hexagonal honeycomb pattern maximizes airflow efficiency while providing structural rigidity to the overall structure

Alienfx lighting is visible from the external faces on the Alien head and the rear vents These zones are controlled through Alienware command center software and can be set to any color in the RGB spectrum

Hardwired for higher performance: Experience unprecedented performance thanks to hyper-efficient voltage regulation engineered to exceed Intel and NVIDIA’s reference design requirements With 8-phase voltage regulation on NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 6GB graphics and 6-phase voltage regulation on 9th Generation Intel Core i7-9750H processor the new Alienware m15 is hardwired for greater efficiency and sustained turbo frequencies enabling longer stretches of GPU and CPU high performance Featuring NVIDIA technologies like ray tracing DLSS and AI-enhanced graphics rendering

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars58 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
